title: Systemic Curriculum Design Workshop for Integrating Teacher Education Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with Basic Educational Technology Tools and Expertise in Social Studies
context.additional_context: Development of personalized technology integration strategies reflecting professional characteristics in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Design three or more technology-integrated educational objectives based on the ISTE NETS standards.
Develop two or more subject-specific technology application scenarios using an academia-field collaboration system.
Create one or more rubrics to measure the effectiveness of technology integration through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
